charges.charge_description: KOWINGLY CONSPIRED TO POSSESS W/INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE MORE THAN 8,700 TABLETS OF A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE, IN VIOLATION OF 21:846; ENTER A BUSINESS REGISTERED WITH D.E.A. WITH THE INTENT TO STEAL TABLETS CONTAINING SHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE IN VIOLATION OF 18:2118
21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE AND POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE SCHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT, 3 YEARS SUPERVISED RELEASE, $300.00 SPECIAL ASSESSMENT, $1,500.00 FINE
